title: FreelanceHub
description: Welcome to the Freelance Marketplace Website ‚Äì a platform that connects freelancers with clients worldwide. This project enables users to post jobs, hire talent, and manage freelance work easily and securely.

details.longDescription: FreelanceHub is a web application where clients can post jobs and freelancers can apply, track their work, and get feedback. It streamlines freelance workflows and helps build trust between users.
details.challenges: Managing user roles (client/freelancer) and implementing secure authentication with Firebase was challenging.
details.improvements: Planning to add real-time chat, Stripe payment integration, and job recommendation system based on user skills.

title: Zero Waste Meals
description: A web-based food donation platform where users can donate extra food, request food, and manage their donations. Built using React, Firebase, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, and React Router.
features: Add food with details like name, quantity, pickup time, and location.
View a list of all donated foods.
Update or delete your own donated food items.

details.longDescription: A web-based food donation platform where users can donate extra food, request food, and manage their donations. Built using React, Firebase, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, and React Router..
details.challenges: Creating accurate delivery cost logic and ensuring responsive form UI was tricky with complex nested form data.
details.improvements: Future plans include admin dashboard, SMS notification system, and delivery partner integration.

title: Coffee Store
description: A fully functional Coffee Store web application where users can order their favorite coffee, like them, and manage coffee items (add, update, delete). Built with React and Firebase.

details.longDescription: A fully functional Coffee Store web application where users can order their favorite coffee, like them, and manage coffee items (add, update, delete). Built with React and Firebase.
details.challenges: Implementing real-time request approval and role-based access for donors and admins was challenging.
details.improvements: Planned features include geolocation-based food pickups, expiration tracking, and SMS notifications for donors.
